languages.text: Несколько почитателей святого Друза были застигнуты Вольным Торговцем на необитаемой планете. Они оберегали тайный подземный комплекс и пытались убить всякого, кто проник в их убежище. В недрах комплекса были обнаружены криосклепы, внутри которых были заключены мертвецы.

The Rogue Trader encountered a number of followers of Saint Drusus on an uninhabited planet. They were guarding a covert underground facility, ready to kill any intruders without mercy. In the depths of the facility, the Rogue Trader discovered cryo-vaults containing dead bodies.
languages.original_text: Несколько почитателей святого Друза были застигнуты Вольным Торговцем на необитаемой планете. Они оберегали тайный подземный комплекс и пытались убить всякого, кто проник в их убежище. В недрах комплекса были обнаружены криосклепы, внутри которых были заключены мертвецы.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader encountered a number of followers of Saint Drusus on an uninhabited planet. They were guarding a covert underground facility, ready to kill any intruders without mercy. In the facility proper, the Rogue Trader discovered cryo-vaults containing dead bodies.

The Rogue Trader encountered a number of followers of Saint Drusus on an uninhabited planet. They were guarding a covert underground facility, ready to kill any intruders without mercy. In the facility proper, the Rogue Trader discovered cryo-vaults containing dead bodies.

The Rogue Trader encountered a number of followers of Saint Drusus on an uninhabited planet. They were guarding a covert underground facility, ready to kill any intruders without mercy. In the depths of the facility, the Rogue Trader discovered cryo-vaults containing dead bodies.

The Rogue Trader encountered a number of followers of Saint Drusus on an uninhabited planet. They were guarding a covert underground facility, ready to kill any intruders without mercy. In the depths of the facility, the Rogue Trader discovered cryo-vaults containing dead bodies.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a rencontré de nombreux disciples de Saint Drusus sur une planète inhabitée. Ils protégeaient un complexe souterrain secret, prêts à tuer sans état d'âme le moindre intrus. Dans les profondeurs du bâtiment, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a découvert des chambres cryogéniques contenant des cadavres.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader encountered a number of followers of Saint Drusus on an uninhabited planet. They were guarding a covert underground facility, ready to kill any intruders without mercy. In the depths of the facility, the Rogue Trader discovered cryo-vaults containing dead bodies.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a rencontré de nombreux disciples de Saint Drusus sur une planète inhabitée. Ils protégeaient un complexe souterrain secret, prêts à tuer sans état d'âme le moindre intrus. Dans les profondeurs du bâtiment, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a découvert des chambres cryogéniques contenant des cadavres.

languages.text: 行商浪人在一颗无人居住的行星上遇到了许多圣德鲁苏斯的追随者。他们守护着某座秘密的地下设施，打算毫不留情地杀死一切入侵者。在这座设施深处，行商浪人发现了许多冷冻舱，里面装着大量尸体。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader encountered a number of followers of Saint Drusus on an uninhabited planet. They were guarding a covert underground facility, ready to kill any intruders without mercy. In the depths of the facility, the Rogue Trader discovered cryo-vaults containing dead bodies.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人在一颗无人居住的行星上遇到了许多圣德鲁苏斯的追随者。他们守护着某座秘密的地下设施，打算毫不留情地杀死一切入侵者。在这座设施深处，行商浪人发现了许多冷冻舱，里面装着大量尸体。

languages.text: ローグトレーダーは無人の惑星で聖ドルススの信者に遭遇した。彼らは秘密の地下施設を警備しており、侵入者を容赦なく殺す準備をしていた。施設の奥深くで、ローグトレーダーは死体の置かれた低温室を発見した。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader encountered a number of followers of Saint Drusus on an uninhabited planet. They were guarding a covert underground facility, ready to kill any intruders without mercy. In the depths of the facility, the Rogue Trader discovered cryo-vaults containing dead bodies.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは無人の惑星で聖ドルススの信者に遭遇した。彼らは秘密の地下施設を警備しており、侵入者を容赦なく殺す準備をしていた。施設の奥深くで、ローグトレーダーは死体の置かれた低温室を発見した。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist auf einem unbewohnten Planeten einigen Anhängern des Heiligen Drusus begegnet. Sie haben eine geheime unterirdische Einrichtung bewacht und waren bereit, jeden Eindringling gnadenlos zu töten. In den Tiefen der Einrichtung hat {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} Cryo-Gräber mit Leichen darin entdeckt.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader encountered a number of followers of Saint Drusus on an uninhabited planet. They were guarding a covert underground facility, ready to kill any intruders without mercy. In the depths of the facility, the Rogue Trader discovered cryo-vaults containing dead bodies.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist auf einem unbewohnten Planeten einigen Anhängern des Heiligen Drusus begegnet. Sie haben eine geheime unterirdische Einrichtung bewacht und waren bereit, jeden Eindringling gnadenlos zu töten. In den Tiefen der Einrichtung hat {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} Cryo-Gräber mit Leichen darin entdeckt.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente se encontró con unos seguidores de san Drusus en un planeta inhabitado. Protegían una instalación subterránea encubierta y no permitían que ningún intruso escapara con vida. En las profundidades de la instalación, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente encontró criocámaras que albergaban cadáveres.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader encountered a number of followers of Saint Drusus on an uninhabited planet. They were guarding a covert underground facility, ready to kill any intruders without mercy. In the depths of the facility, the Rogue Trader discovered cryo-vaults containing dead bodies.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente se encontró con unos seguidores de san Drusus en un planeta inhabitado. Protegían una instalación subterránea encubierta y no permitían que ningún intruso escapara con vida. En las profundidades de la instalación, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente encontró criocámaras que albergaban cadáveres.
